data.description:
Welcome to a brutal world where visceral motion-controlled combat blends seamlessly with god-scale base-building and asynchronous multiplayer raids.

Use fists, axes, swords, bows, rocks, or anything you can grab to dominate your foes in intense 1st-person combat. Then jump out to your immortal form and watch your minions carry on the battle while you rain down meteors from above. Systemic combat, versatile enemy AI, and player-created defenses make every battle unique.

But remember, you aren’t the only Semigod in Barbaria! Attack other players’ realms to increase your Mightiness, and receive rewards when you successfully repel others. Watch replays in miniature from your Stronghold, then strategically place and upgrade more structures, champions, and minions to keep future attackers at bay.

Features:
● Kill it your way: 1st-person combat with a variety of weapons and minions who can serve as both allies and enemies
● Asynchronous Multiplayer: Attack player-created realms, and get attack notifications each time you launch the game
● Realm Building: Snap together realm Fragments and strategically set up your defenses
● Raid Replay: Watch tabletop replays of attacks on your realm by other players 
● Death from Above: Hop out to god-scale and use Ancient Powers to direct the battle from on high

changelog.change_log:
Barbaria 1.6.1 Patch Update

- Fix naming weapons at the naming station
- Fix weekly challenges not showing up
- Fix old award trophies not showing up
- Fix blocking two tunnels entrances
- Fix Level 6 Quiver damage
- Update Party Crashers delay time before spawn from 30s to 20s

Barbaria 1.6 - Age of Excess Update

The Age of Excess is expanding across Barbaria!

* Increased Level Cap: Most items now upgradeable to level 6. Realms will go to level 5 (but there will still be a max of 4 fragments).
* Larger Space for your Realm: Significantly expanded the build area to allow for new configurations of Fragments.
* Expanded Cosmetics: New Champion Skins, Hats for champions and minions, Fragment connector skinning, IAP currency for cosmetics only.
* Weekly Challenges and new Daily Challenge types
* Allow naming and tracking of kills for weapons
* Flaunt your Wealth: Use your excess Violence to buy your way up the wealth leaderboard
* Fixed: Reduce memory usage for Quest3
* Fixed: Statue blocking God Powers
* Fixed: Statues Overlapping Realms
* Fixed: Placement exploits blocking progress on certain fragment caps
* Fixed: Bank Item Display Issue
* And more!

Barbaria 1.6 - Age of Excess Update

The Age of Excess is expanding across Barbaria!

* Increased Level Cap: Most items now upgradeable to level 6. Realms will go to level 5 (but there will still be a max of 4 fragments).
* Larger Space for your Realm: Significantly expanded the build area to allow for new configurations of Fragments.
* Expanded Cosmetics: New Champion Skins, Hats for champions and minions, Fragment connector skinning, IAP currency for cosmetics only.
* Weekly Challenges and new Daily Challenge types
* Allow naming and tracking of kills for weapons
* Flaunt your Wealth: Use your excess Violence to buy your way up the wealth leaderboard
* Fixed: Reduce memory usage for Quest3
* Fixed: Statue blocking God Powers
* Fixed: Statues Overlapping Realms
* Fixed: Placement exploits blocking progress on certain fragment caps
* And more!

Barbaria 1.5.1.21478 Quest Patch Update

- Fix crash when going into the system menu or taking the headset off.

Barbaria 1.5.1 Patch Update

Caverns of the Unknown Balance Updates: 
- Allies from shrines now spawn with weapons
- Shrine equipment and ally minion level increases on pace with cavern enemy level progression rather than always starting at Level 1
- Decrease difficulty jump every 4th room
- Increase random shrine drop percentage
- Increase final room violence bonus

Additional Changes:
- Divine Sword now steals a fixed 10% of the stabbing champion’s health, or all the remaining health of the enemy if the remaining health is less than 10% of the stabbing champion’s health.
- Moving Wall Behavior Change: Based on player feedback and discussion in Discord, moving walls will now start down for 2s when entering a fragment before raising and resuming their normal cycle.
- Decrease placement radius restrictions around non-entrance fragment connectors.
- When “Auto Replays on Boot” option is disabled, do not download replay until manually selected in History station to improve time to gameplay in slow server connection situations.
- Adjust early realm match making buckets to smooth out difficulty jump around Fortitude 100
- Fix allies getting destroyed when moving between areas in Caverns of the Unknown
- Fix placement cost for Cavern of Mystery Cap
- Fix Gladiatrix weapon recall not staggering Zealots and champions
- Fix spawner animation reset after replays
- Fix fragment placement overlapping caps in some situations
- Fix Test My Base replays getting uploaded and potentially causing failed replay downloads from other player attacks.

Join us on Discord and let us know what you think!
https://discord.gg/ZyGzJRQURm

Barbaria 1.5 - Age of the Unknown Update

** New Feature: Caverns of the Unknown** Battle through procedurally generated caverns in this new roguelike area to earn currency and compete on the leaderboard.  Buffs and bonuses found between fragments grant additional health, extra arrow damage, allies, divine weapons and more to make every run unique.  Unlock 4 new cosmetic statues for your realm along the way as you venture deeper into the Unknown.
* New Fragment: UTurn
* New Caps: Tunnel Tower, Stairway, Cavern of Mystery
* New Structures: 6 different Party Crashers - Party Crashers provide backup support on your fragment. They wait to spawn in until there are 3 or fewer allies remaining and the fragment has been activated for at least 30s (think reinforcements for your defenses). Crashers come in pairs, and will be outfitted with a random melee or ranged kit depending on the type you place.

Improvements and Fixes:
- Fix Unbreakable Fences and Walls
- Poise System: Show poise bar beneath enemy health bar to make it easier to see when your hits will stagger an enemy.
- Fix moving walls starting in down position
- Fix Melee boost structure not saving on realm
- Fix Gladiatrix fighting with no weapon when trying to recall
- Make NPCs prefer to throw throwing axes.
- Fix minions getting placed in boons area
- Fix NPCs not crushing crystals for some structures
- Fix NPCs on connectors not running onto the active tile
- Balance: Decrease throwing axe damage multiplier
- Balance: Increase life steal amount when using Divine Sword

Barbaria 1.4.2 Patch Update Notes

Merry Christmas!  We’re including a few bonus items for the mid-age patch update.

** New Reward Level: Batter Up - It may not be baseball season, but in Barbaria you can now get some batting practice in while you wait. This Bonus level will drop randomly as a reward from chests, and a brick oven cannon will pitch rocks to you that you can hit back to flying targets for Violence rewards.
** New Weapon: Divine Sword - When stabbing with this sword, champions can press trigger to use their Divine Juice and steal a bit of life from an enemy.
** See Custom Character Names from Other Players - With the Brawns Age Update we introduced the ability to give each champion and minion a custom name and begin tracking their individual kill counts and other stats.  Now when you attack other player realms, those custom names will come through above the health bar of enemy NPCs.

Improvements and Fixes:
- Zealot placement cost decreased to 3, and slight decrease on his health/damage stats.
- Show personal bests on the scoreboard for Symphony of Violence, Batter Up, and Ring of Champions.
- Add line of sight requirements for NPC throwing and shooting, and fix some issues with ranged NPCs not attacking.
- Add Total Daily Challenges complete board at Rise N Grind station.
- Imps and Skeletons are now stabbable during idle and attacks.
- Quest3 Performance Updates: Expanded the dynamic resolution scaling range, added some new character lods, and decreased overall memory usage.
- Fix named character defensive stats not updating.
- Fix boon effects not getting cleared after use.
- Fix reinforcements auto-deploying when disabled in daily challenges.
- Fix reinforcements getting hidden there and not showing up for later building.
- Fix thrown weapons falling right next to NPCs after a throw.
- Fix missing floor piece visibility from god mode on Over Under fragment.
- Prevent Marauder’s Blade from stabbing.

Barbaria 1.4.1 Patch Update Notes

Merry Christmas!  We’re including a few bonus items for the mid-age patch update.

** See Custom Character Names from Other Players - With the Brawns Age Update we introduced the ability to give each champion and minion a custom name and begin tracking their individual kill counts and other stats.  Now when you attack other player realms, those custom names will come through above the health bar of enemy NPCs.

- Quest3 Performance Updates: Expanded the dynamic resolution scaling range, added some new character lods, and decreased overall memory usage.
- Fix named character defensive stats not updating.
- Fix boon effects not getting cleared after use.
- Fix reinforcements auto-deploying when disabled in daily challenges.

- Fix thrown weapons falling right next to NPCs after a throw.
- Fix missing floor piece visibility from god mode on Over Under fragment.
- Prevent Marauder’s Blade from stabbing.

Barbaria 1.4 - Brawns Age Update

The Brawns Age has begun in Barbaria, with character naming, new skill bonuses you can unlock at the gym, and more!

New Features:
- Skill Point Training at the Gym: Place a champion or minion on one of the workout stations in Bar-bell-baria to train and get temporary skill point boosts to your attack damage, defensive resistance, or divine juice recharge rate.  Training lasts through the end of the age.
- Character Naming and Stat Tracking: The Tower of Administration allows you to rename any of your champions or minions. Names will appear above their health bars in battle. Named characters will get their kill counts, battles participated, and battles won on both attack and defense recorded for posterity. See character stats by pulling up the info panel above characters, and find the Tower of Administration near the front ledge of the stronghold.
- Human Shielding: Grab Imps and hold them in front of you to block arrows, rocks, and weapon hits from others.
- Pummeling: Held NPCs won't escape for 10s, giving you time to bash and do more damage to them before letting go.
- Rapid Crush: Press trigger to use divine juice when crushing power crystals to instantly crush it.
- 3 new boons: Bonus Mightiness, Bonus Currency, Bonus Loot.

Fixes and Improvements:
- Quest Resolution Increase and Dynamic Resolution: By using dynamic resolution, we are now able to increase our rendering resolution when gpu time allows giving a better view fidelity for most Quest gameplay. Dynamic resolution should also make performance more stable by scaling rendering down a bit during high draw situations.
- Embedded arrows and throwing axes now dislodge and drop to the ground when hit.
- Added Level icon and tooltip to capacity UI above fragments to help make more clear that fragments can also be upgraded.
- Added manual save button when editing realm.
- Increase frequency of Symphony of Violence drops.
- Fix allies stealing crystal from player.
- Fix arrows bouncing off NPC archers.
- Fix rare “invisible wall” on Skeleton spawner fragment.
- Fix enemies not destroying cannon crystals.

Patch Update 1.4.0.20893
- Fix Gladiatrix taking damage when recalling weapon sometimes
- Fix Zealots disappearing at certain distances
- Fix NPC archers picking up rocks instead of shooting
- Fix Awards not showing up in Ages station
- Fix Gold and Marble statue materials on Gladiatrix statues

Graphical Improvements for Quest3:
- Realtime Shadows
- Improved Character rendering
- Improved anti-aliasing
- Improved post-processing

Graphical Improvements for Quest3:
- Realtime Shadows
- Improved Character rendering
- Improved anti-aliasing
- Improved post-processing

Graphical Improvements for Quest3:
- Realtime Shadows
- Improved Character rendering
- Improved anti-aliasing
- Improved post-processing

Barbaria 1.3 - Age of Divine Favor

The Age of Divine Favor has dawned in Barbaria, bringing Boons, Achievements, new Structures, new Fragment Caps, Taunts, and more!

# New Features:

- **Boons:**  Boons are a new single use bonus item that players can equip on an attack.  8 Unique boon types grant various bonuses, such as a Boost to Shooting Damage, Boost to Imp attack damage, Boost to God power regeneration rate, etc.  A single boon can be used in each attack, and they will drop randomly from chests or be purchasable at Doug’s with in-game currency.
- **Achievements:** 25 Unlockable Achievements now available!
- **Sell Items:** At long last, you can now sell items at Doug’s Discount Deity
- **New Caps:** Added 3 new caps to expand your realm building possibilities.
- **New Structures:**  Divine Juice Drain, Block Sabotage, Block Bamboozle, Rock
- **New Taunts:** Two new taunts for all champions

## Improvements, Balance Updates, and Fixes:

- Item Stand Sorting: Added buttons on item stands to sort items by name, or by level to more quickly find what you need.
- Prevent Krank’s bombs from disabling structures before he enters a fragment
- Reduce Krank’s divine juice regeneration rate, and decrease the area of effect on bomb explosion.
- Increase Throwing Axe damage
- Increase damage for Imp and Skeleton Buff Structures
- Fix player freeze when ally cyclotaur smashes things
- Fix Level 8 Imps
- Fix Level number on Upgrade Realm tooltip
- Fix attribute display on some defensive buff structures
- Various other Performance and Bug fixes

Please drop by our Discord and let us know what you think, and looking forward to seeing what you all create!
https://stalwart.com/discord

Barbaria 1.2.2 Patch Update

- Fix bug that allowed players to re-use their reinforcements under certain circumstances

Barbaria 1.2.1 Patch Update

- Fix translation missing errors
- Fix progression blockage on certain levels when using alternate skins
- Fix Bar-bell-baria animations when using alternate skins
- Fix fragment caps missing names and descriptions
- Fix Reinforcements Tooltips
- Fix a few rare crashes

Barbaria 1.2 - The Age of Expression

The Age of Retribution has ended and the Age of Expression begins! We’ve added 6 new structures, a new item type (Fragment caps), and lots of new customization options so you can expand your realms and make them uniquely your own.

New Features:

* Cosmetics and Customization: Take your champions and minions to the customization station to chose alternate outfits, skin tones, and pick your Taunts.  Unlock new skins for your statues.

* Friendly Attack Replays: Carnage Carnival allows you to search for other players by name and attack their Realm or Playground in an unranked mode. These attacks now generate notifications and will send replays to those you attack.

* New Item Type: Fragment Caps. Place fragment caps on unused connection points in your realm for extra piece placement possibilities.

* Taunts: Choose an animated taunt for your champion to perform during replay notifications after successful attacks.

* New Structures: Archery Boost, Melee Boost, Defense Boost, Speed Boost, Ruined Wall, Bait.

* Equip weapons to left, right, or both hands on champions

Improvements, Balance Changes, and Fixes:
- Added 2 more reinforcements slots for a total of 4.
- Added Auto-deploy Reinforcements option (defaults to on)
- Added “No Turn” Option for Quest players who want to physically turn only
- 10min limit on 4 tile realms
- Show affect radius around relevant structures
- Max Fragment placement capacity per tile set to 24 (max level + 2 feasts)
- Players can unlock 2 additional feasts for a total of 4
- Fixed NPCs tending to ignore weapon racks
- Fixed reinforcements getting respawned onto the stands after they die
- Various bug fixes and polish improvements

Suggestions, Questions or comments? Join us on Discord!
stalwart.com/discord

Barbaria 1.1.2 Patch Update

- Expand placement area around unused fragment connections
- Do not allow clearing a tile or ending an attack by bamboozling the last enemy
- Improve Ranged AI's standing around doing nothing when they can't hit the target they want
- Shorter spawner cooldown for Imp and Skeleton spawners
- Reduce memory usage
- Fix sword scale on weapon rack structure
- Fix item levels on weapon racks
- Fix info text size for Marauder’s Shield
